idea-plugin.name: version-catalog-helper
idea-plugin.description:
Autocomplete and version assistance for Gradle version catalogs (libs.versions.toml).

Features:

  • Autocomplete available versions from Maven Central
  • Shows latest stable vs preview versions
  • Displays release dates
  • Works with standard version catalog format

Usage:

Start typing a version number in the [versions] section of your libs.versions.toml file and press Ctrl+Space to see available versions.
